duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform skin analysis and evaluation on clients
Consult patients for medical weight loss treatment both virtual and in person
Develop a plan to ensure patient’s goals are met
Maintain inventory of supplies and equipment for treatments through proper documentation
Develop an appropriate treatment plan based on the client consultations
Administer injectable treatments such as dermal fillers botox and other well known products in a professional/clinical atmosphere
Accurate charting and clinical documentation of each client
Recommends various treatments, skin regimens based on client consultations
Create content, post, and participate in marketing initiatives

education_certification.credential: Minimum 2 years of aesthetic experience required
Florida State License with the Department of Health must be Current and in Good Standing
Must be a licensed Nurse Practitioner or P.A. in the state of Florida
Proven sales experience with the ability to upsell services
